attributes.action: condemn the use of torture by Saudi Arabia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UN definition of torture includes both activities designed to extract information and activities designed for punishment or revenge. By practicing flogging, amputation and other punishments, Saudi Arabia blatantly violates this UN definition. By supporting Saudi Arabia we are supporting torture.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
